plot outline: Sameer Deshpande arrives at the police station taking responsibility of a murder and has no regrets.Sameer was hardworking and helpful guy working for charity.He and is friends are part of a rock band and raise funds for the needy people,Sameer comes across a rape victim Asawari Joshi and feels that injustice has been done to her.He decides to take the responsibility in his own hands by challenging the system by killing Asawari's rapist.
title: Janiva
plot: Can you take law in your hands to give justice to a victim you don't know? How far will you go to make the Govt realize the need of changing the system?

Sameer Deshpande arrives at the police station taking responsibility of a murder and has no regrets.Sameer was hardworking and helpful guy working for charity.He and is friends are part of a rock band and raise funds for the needy people,Sameer comes across a rape victim Asawari Joshi and feels that injustice has been done to her.He decides to take the responsibility in his own hands by challenging the system by killing Asawari's rapist.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
